backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented YouTube preview and validation features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing autogenerated summaries of multiple frontend components and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root element and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theme provider, and global toaster for the React application.
frontend/src/components/AdminDemoModeTog: Toggle button enabling or disabling the simulated attacker dashboard view.
frontend/src/components/AIRiskDetectorPa: AI risk panel displaying threat meter, typing metrics, and heuristic-based risk visuals.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedInfograp: Canvas-based animated overlay drawn over a static infographic image.
frontend/src/components/AttackerDashboar: Simulated attacker view showing captured keystrokes, reconstructed text, and optional transmission animation.
frontend/src/components/AttackSimulation: Timeline showing staged progression of simulated keylogger attack events.
frontend/src/components/AutoBlockingAler: Shows an alert when auto-blocking is triggered and provides info plus a reset button.
frontend/src/components/AwarenessQuiz.ts: Implements a multi‑question cybersecurity quiz with scoring, explanations, and completion state.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: Displays an educational‑use disclaimer explaining that the simulation is local and safe.
frontend/src/components/HelpTooltip.tsx: Wraps children with a tooltip component showing contextual help text.
frontend/src/components/InContextWarning: Renders a small warning box with an info icon and a provided message.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout including header navigation, background, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ModuleInfoPopove: Provides an info button with optional tooltip and a popover showing module details.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingOverla: Implements a multi‑step onboarding guide introducing app features and usage.
frontend/src/components/ReportGeneratorB: Generates and downloads a local simulation report and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/RotatingDashboar: Creates a 3D‑tilting dashboard card effect based on mouse movement.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioVideoMod: Modal component that displays scenario demo videos with YouTube embed handling and accessibility-focused focus management.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedAntivir: Visual antivirus simulation UI showing scan states, detection info, and actions like quarantine or removal.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedCounter: Displays counters for keystrokes, scans, and blocks based on simulation state.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedKeylogg: Simulated keylogger input box that captures typed text and reacts to block state.
frontend/src/components/SimulationSettin: Settings panel allowing users to adjust local simulation options such as auto-blocking and scan duration.
frontend/src/components/TestScenariosPan: Interface for running predefined or custom simulation scenarios and previewing associated videos.
frontend/src/components/ThreatMeter3D.ts: Canvas-based 3D-style threat meter that visualizes risk level and percentage with animated drawing.
frontend/src/components/ThreeSceneAccent: Three.js accent scene rendering a rotating ring with orbit controls for visual enhancement.
frontend/src/components/TransmissionAnim: Simple animated UI element indicating simulated data transmission activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Manages onboarding modal state using localStorage to track dismissal and expose open/reset actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Stub hook returning no backend queries since the simulation is fully client-side.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulationState.ts: Zustand store managing keystroke capture, risk detection, AV simulation, blocking logic, and configurable settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, utility classes, and custom animations.
frontend/src/lib/customScenarioVideos.ts: Handles localStorage persistence and validation of custom per-scenario YouTube video links.
frontend/src/lib/reportGenerator.ts: Builds a text-based simulation report and triggers its download as a file.
frontend/src/lib/scenarioVideos.ts: Provides static scenario-to-YouTube mappings and utilities to resolve embed URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AwarenessPage.tsx: Renders an educational page explaining keyloggers, their types, and prevention tips using structured sections and visual components.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Builds an interactive simulation dashboard with onboarding, keylogger demo modules, attacker panel, risk detection, counters, and reset/help controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines the project's overall state, constraints, features, known issues, and architectural guidelines for the keylogger awareness tool.
